overview: Practice is the key to reading and spelling success, and this video makes it fun. Delayed answers and the "on-screen mouth" let students check their reading and pronunciation. Covers long vowels, r-controlled vowels, diphthongs, syllables, ending sounds, rule breakers, common sight words, and words with silent consonants. Read-along stories and fun songs provide practice applying the rules and help to build reading fluency.
title: Rock 'N Learn: Phonics Volume 2
